com.safenetinc.jcprov.params

Class CK_AES_GMAC_PARAMS

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.safenetinc.jcprov.params.CK_AES_GMAC_PARAMS

  • public class CK_AES_GMAC_PARAMS
extends java.lang.Object
    SafeNet Inc. Parameter for the
    CKM.AES_GMAC
    mechanism.

    Further information is provided in the Programmers Manual.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      byte[] aad
      The additional authenticated data.
      byte[] iv
      Variable length IV data.
      long tagBits
      The size of the authentication tag in bits.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CK_AES_GMAC_PARAMS()
      Initialize the AES GMAC parameters.
      CK_AES_GMAC_PARAMS(byte[] iv)
      Initialize the AES GMAC parameters by the specified IV.
      CK_AES_GMAC_PARAMS(byte[] iv, byte[] aad)
      Initialize the AES GMAC parameters by the specified IV and additional authenticated data.
      CK_AES_GMAC_PARAMS(byte[] iv, byte[] aad, long tagBits)
      Initialize the AES GMAC parameters by the specified IV and additional authenticated data.

    • Field Detail

      • iv

        public final byte[] iv
        Variable length IV data.

      • aad

        public final byte[] aad
        The additional authenticated data. The maximun size is 1024 bytes.

      • tagBits

        public final long tagBits
        The size of the authentication tag in bits. The maximum size is 128 bits and is multiple by 8.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CK_AES_GMAC_PARAMS

        public CK_AES_GMAC_PARAMS()
        Initialize the AES GMAC parameters. There will be no additional data. The authenticated tag size is automatically set to 128 bits. The IV is generated from HSM.

      • CK_AES_GMAC_PARAMS

        public CK_AES_GMAC_PARAMS(byte[] iv)
        Initialize the AES GMAC parameters by the specified IV. There will be no additional authenticated data. The authenticated tag size is automatically set to 128 bits.

      • CK_AES_GMAC_PARAMS

        public CK_AES_GMAC_PARAMS(byte[] iv,
                          byte[] aad)
        Initialize the AES GMAC parameters by the specified IV and additional authenticated data. The authenticated tag size is automatically set to 128 bits.
        Parameters:
        iv - array of initialized vector data.
        aad - array of additional authenticate data.

      • CK_AES_GMAC_PARAMS

        public CK_AES_GMAC_PARAMS(byte[] iv,
                          byte[] aad,
                          long tagBits)
        Initialize the AES GMAC parameters by the specified IV and additional authenticated data.
        Parameters:
        iv - array of initialized vector data.
        aad - array of additional authenticate data.
        tagBits - The authenticated tag size in bits. Must be in multiple of 8 bits.

    • Method Detail

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object object)

        equals in class java.lang.Object
